g++   -std=c++0x -ggdb -fsigned-char -freg-struct-return -fPIC -Wall -W -Wshadow -Wpointer-arith -Wcast-qual -Winline -DGNUPC    CMakeFiles/testMonitorCnt.dir/TestMonitorCnt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/testMonitorCnt.dir/TestRcvCnt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/testMonitorCnt.dir/TestSndCnt.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/testMonitorCnt -rdynamic -lrt ../../lib/libtest_4.so ../../lib/libtestcommon.a -lrt -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/home/zf/workspace_cpp/test_4/lib
